__e: No, no, I can't stand the thought of you marrying someone that you don't love because you think it's the right thing to do.
Mm. The truth is... I don't want to see you with Max because I can't stand the thought of you with him and not me.
I eat here every day before I go home because I can't stand my wife's cooking.
I cannot stand what it does to you or to me.
I just can't cope with the smell of food cooking. Not a good thing in my line of work.
After all that, I can't stand my name.
But i put up with it... Because it's what you want to do.
If you apologize, I'm gonna feel like a jerk for not forgiving you, and then if I do forgive you, you're just... You're just gonna break my heart all over again, and I can't handle that.
You know, that's great if you have absolutely any idea what the hell you want the rest of your life to look like, but I just don't, and I can't take it.
And believe me, I don't want to see you go, but I just can't stand to see you stay here.
I can't stand to see this happen again ... not to you and not to that little girl.
Okay, but just in case I don't know if I can handle seeing his face.
You know the unofficial one, which is that I can't stand to have you in the classroom anymore.
I know you're married to Peter, but I love you and I can't stand it anymore!
I don't know why you're here, but I can't take much more.
Rose is my love, that was she is, and I ain't having you lot telling me otherwise.
It makes me anguished, it makes me feel bad!
I'm doing this because you're my brother, and I can't stand the idea of you living the rest of your life in prison.
